posts.text: I am pretty happy to have managed to get @ghost.org up and in production on a raspberry pi. I'm not a software developer. Feels great to make something actually work hahaha. Even added a nifty bluesky feed, inspired by @molly.wiki on the @flipboard.com podcast with @mmccue.bsky.social. BenWest.blog

What could possibly go wrong...

externalLink.description: Three sources described how AI is writing alerts for Citizen and broadcasting them without prior human review. In one case AI mistranslated ‚Äúmotor vehicle accident‚Äù to ‚Äúmurder vehicle accident.‚Äù

posts.text: Wow, this is such a mess. Siiigh. Thanks for sharing @evacide.bsky.social
